title: High Ping
body:
Good Day Riot,

For about two weeks whenever I try to play ARAM/ Normal games I begin with 20-30 ms once minions spawns and I begin to battle the game lags immensely and goes up to 3-600 ms, I did all the tests you suggested online however it still lags. I then tried to send the data recovered from the Hextech repair tool. I am logged in when i select "I am having technical difficulties" it then leads me to the link below:
https://login.support.riotgames.com/error?error_code=VALIDATION_FALSE
Riot please I love playing this game, and I am very irritated at the moment with this LAG.

Please assist

replies.body: It sounds like you might be experiencing packet loss here, which can result in sudden bursts of spikes like this.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) so we can get a better overview.  Let me know what you found, and we'll go from there.

https://lagreport.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/
link to lag report.

the thing is when i play other games this doesnt happen.

Hey there, this gives a general idea of your ISP but not your specific situation.  The [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) grabs your own game files to analyze what happened.  You can have issues with specific services, so your internet or other games can be fine.
